intro.title: What is a Brief?
intro.description: It's a questionnaire designed to understand your project in depth: objective, audience, style and budget. With your answers, we create a proposal that fits exactly what you need.

webDesign.title: Web Design Brief
webDesign.description: Questions about type of website (landing, corporate, e-commerce), necessary sections, visual style, functionalities.

branding.title: Branding & Graphic Design Brief
branding.description: Questions about current identity, preferred colors, style references, target audience.

socialMedia.title: Social Media & Copywriting Brief
socialMedia.description: Questions about communication tone, main platforms, posting frequency, examples of brands you admire.

marketing.title: Digital Marketing Brief (Ads & Setup)
marketing.description: Questions about campaign objective (sales, leads, visibility), target audience, approximate budget.

consulting.title: Business Consulting Brief
consulting.description: Questions about sector, company size, main challenges (financial, strategic, digital).

briefsGrid.title: Choose your
briefsGrid.subtitle: Select the type of service you need and complete the corresponding form.

finalCta.title: Can't decide which one?
finalCta.description: Don't worry, contact us and we'll help you identify the best service for your project.
